name: Gingerbread man to the rescue!
description:
Based on a true story…

Once upon a time, in the North Pole, Santa and his helpers were preparing for Christmas this year. 

Elfs, Snowman and the Gingerbread man were helping him.

Everyone was happy and working like a Swiss clock! The presents were almost done…

… but one day an evil creature appeared and everything changed …

… it kidnapped Santa and possessed all his helpers.

Everyone except you and your kind …

You, the king of the Gingerbread man managed to escape the house and brought all of your people with you.

On your way out you decided to take the Magic Deck of Cards with you to help you fight this creature.

So it’s up to you to save Santa, his helpers and overall Christmas for everyone!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move the camera
  • Mouse click to select and right click to command

Theme: Winter, delay the inevitable
